attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: When you first open the app, you see a orange oompa loompa. I had to go vomit before i continued on the app. the app is horrible and promotes and the owner promotes fascism, racism, homophobia, sexism and other disgusting things. do not get this app it also crashes 25/8 and downloads all your personal data to track you and listen to everything you’re saying.

attributes.title: WORST APP I’VE EVER DOWNLOADED!
attributes.review: I am appalled by this app. When I opened I saw an image that I will NEVER unsee! It’s some sort of orange mutant creature thin, corn like strings emerging from the head. I will never be the same after this. This app is also very poorly made and glitches all of the time. This app is horrible, don’t download it! Apple should delete it, it gives them a bad image and scared people for life.

attributes.title: It Almost made me die😡😡😡
attributes.review: This app is atrocious I can’t even believe my eyes!!!!!! It’s horrible first thing I saw was a Cheeto  with his fist up 😡 that alone made my soul jump out of my body in fear ,it went 👻👿 this app needs to be deleted how can such a dangerous app be on here it kills I tell you💀 and it has lies like “make America Great again “ like a Cheeto can’t do that soo why lie 💀DELETE THE APPP OFF APP STORE!!!!!! We gon riot

attributes.title: This gave me scoliosis
attributes.review: I truly support trump and decided to download this app but to my surprise, as soon as i opened the app, my back started to hurt so much that i had to get an ambulance to the ER and was diagnosed with SCOLIOSIS. Yes, SCOLIOSIS. The trump administration decided to get me fired from my job because of my filed complaint against them so now i am in debt and have to owe thousands of dollars for medical and ambulance ride bill.

attributes.title: Warning! Do not download!
attributes.review: So I opened the app with an expectation of something, anything presidential. To my dismay, I was greeted by the photo of a child predator. If I could erase my memory of this app, I would, please never download this! Also after opening the application, my phone downloaded a virus which leaked my photo gallery to everyone on my contact list!!

attributes.title: This app is Monstrous
attributes.review: I downloaded this app after I heard of it’s popularity but as soon as I pressed the download button, my phone malfunctioned! I truly believe that this app is cursed. My phone will forever be traumatized. -0 out of 10! Even after I cancelled the download, strange things occurred to me. I couldn’t even walk out of my house without feeling nauseous.

attributes.title: embarrassing!!
attributes.review: i was so excited to get this app! one place to get all of the latest news on donnie? what a dream! but i was so disappointed 😞 this caused my phone to crash, get TONS of notifications, and gave me viruses!! you would think the POTUS would have a good team of people to create a wonderful app, but no! 👎🏻 so disappointed donald.. biden would never do us this dirty

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: I opened the app  to a ogre in a suit with a red tie on. The ogre start to smile and all the skin on his face started to fall. I started to cry at the sight of it😭. My little siblings walked by and they started to cry. They saw the ogre in the nightmares and didn’t sleep for a week because they where so scared. The ogre started to talk about how it’s  running for president but all I saw was its yellow teeth and droopy skin wagging back and worth.

attributes.title: I am disappointed
attributes.review: Words cannot describe the amount of anguish I feel, first, the app says that my phone number isn’t logging in even though I already had an account, then when I logged in, it signed me out immediately. I don’t know what the developers are doing with this app, but it better change😡

attributes.title: I’m confused
attributes.review: So I open the app and put my phone number in when it takes to a child porn website, exotic animal trading site, and tons of other sketchy sites. Is this some sort of sick joke! I was told I could get info on all the new rallies but now my phone has an internet virus from all of the different pop up adds
